mapper.insert: insert into group_team (id, group_id, group_name, master_id, upper_limit, status, type, build_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upperLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buildTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, group_id, group_name, master_id, upper_limit, status, type, build_time from group_team
